entry.title: It's Just Revenge
entry.summary:
Author: Writing_Queeen

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 102,458Chapters: 24/25Kudos: 1,424

Summary: Gerard and Kate took everything from the Hales and from the sheriff when they burned down the Hale house and killed Claudia and their son. Now years later the Argents are back in town and Derek sees a way to get revenge in the form of Gerard's grandson, Stiles. Derek kidnaps Stiles but things aren't what they seem with the boy. Could taking Stiles actually have been a good thing for the boy? And if it was how far will Gerard and Kate go to get him back? Remember, Revenge Haunts All Of Us.

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,986Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 15

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

entry.title: True North
entry.summary:
Author: aDeceasedTulip

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 964Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: Occasionally he misses the adrenaline rush that comes with running for your life until your lungs hurt from the strain. He misses the out of breath 'thank fuck we're alive' kisses they used to share (although now there's lots more kissing all of the time.)Derek had been missing that this week, so the second Friday hit, he asked Stiles if he wanted to hit up The Jungle. To which he was answered with an enthusiastic "yes" and an even more enthusiastic kisses trailing south.Anyway, Derek was currently sat in a booth to the left of the dance floor, sipping on Stiles' rum and coke. Stiles had left him in favour of dancing along to the music. Derek couldn't take his eyes off of him; the way Stiles moved was positively sinful, demanding the attention of anyone with eyes.ORStiles and Derek go to the club!!

entry.title: Just Kids, Once
entry.summary:
Author: hubrys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,752Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 15

Summary: “You left. Just like that. No goodbyes. No nothing.”“Stiles, I—”“Don’t. You walked away, Derek. After everything. I needed you to stay.”“I didn’t know how.”“You weren’t the first to go. Maybe just the one I hoped wouldn’t.”_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________They grew up clinging to each other in a house that promised nothing. Years later, Stiles dances in a cage and Derek’s about to get married. Some stories don’t start with love. Some start when everything else has already fallen apart.

entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,639Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 40

Summary: Stiles is still reeling from Derek’s abandonment months after their relationship fell apart. When Derek unexpectedly shows up at his door following a breakup of his own, Stiles is forced to confront the heartbreak he never got closure for. When Derek left without warning, he was convinced he was doing the right thing by walking away before he could destroy what they had. But the distance only reveals how much he truly lost, how much. When he returns, desperate and aching, he finds Stiles still smoldering with pain and close to being broken.

entry.title: call it off
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,950Chapters: 4/11Kudos: 371

Summary: “You kissed me,” Stiles says. To that, Derek says nothing. His gaze does not leave Stiles’ mouth. “But you… you’re straight,” Stiles carries on. And still, Derek says nothing. His fingers twitch harshly around his grip on thin air. “You have a girlfriend,” Stiles whispers. Derek is on his feet in an instant.  Stiles is the gay, terminally-single loser of Beacon Hills High. Derek is the straight, cheerleader-dating jock he should have been smart enough to stay away from.

entry.title: How to colossally fuck shit up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,884Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 98

Summary: Derek is brought back to life by our favorite FBI-agent, Stiles Stilinski.They have sex and Derek gets pregnant.A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Why would Derek do that?
